description: React component 'Rail' renders a horizontal scrollable row of items, highlighting the focused index. It displays a title and a list of cards with background images.

methods.name: Rail({ title, items, focusedIndex })
methods.description: Functional React component that displays a rail of items with a highlighted focused index.

ctags.name: Rail
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Rail({ title, items, focusedIndex }) {$/
